task: Search for a recipe for Beef Wellington on Allrecipes that has at least 200 reviews and an average rating of 4.5 stars or higher. List the main ingredients required for the dish.
user_action_and_explanation: scroll down further to view the full ingredients list. This will provide all the main ingredients required for the Beef Wellington recipe.
observation:
The main ingredients for the Beef Wellington recipe are listed. They include:
- 2 ½ pounds beef tenderloin
- 4 tablespoons butter, softened, divided
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1 onion, chopped
- ½ cup sliced fresh mushrooms
- 2 ounces liver pâté
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed
- 1 large egg yolk, beaten
- 1 (10.5 ounce) can beef broth
- 2 tablespoons red wine.
